Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 out of all reviewer-related reminder activities (including Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurring after SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of process variants that include Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 at least once
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Number of times Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 is followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that occur in cases ultimately leading to SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 compared to the frequency of SW-Reviewer No Response
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer No Response'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 executed within three days after SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 3 days'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurrences per variant containing SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that are not followed by any further reviewer response activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, or SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases where 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in variants that result in a Major Revision versus those that result in an Accept decision
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of cases where Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 appears more than once
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Ratio of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 to SW-Reviewer Agreed across the entire event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Number of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 activities that precede a change in editor (e.g., Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor)
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'Assign a Different Editor' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 occurring in the context of challenge papers (i.e., following SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper)
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers Challenge Paper'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in comparison to Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that occur after at least two instances of SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Number of variants in which Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 directly precedes SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Number of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 executed more than 7 days after the initial SW-AE Assign Reviewers activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 in cases with performance duration above the median variant performance
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2 that are part of loops involving repeated reviewer assignment and decline cycles
Metric: Percentage of 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'
